data.description:
Cut/up has been created as response to a Reddit request made by /u/stegosaurusflex1 who conceived the "cutting edge" design.

The font is called "Peace Sans", designed by Sergey Ryadovoy.

If you want to be able to see more data in the same design, checkout the complementary watchapp: Cut/up+

* All colors are fully customizable (backgrounds, number colors, number borders, cutting line and cutting line borders).

* The cutting line doubles as a Bluetooth connection status indicator.

* Vibrations on Bluetooth connection loss and reconnection.

* Tapping the watch can show the date.

* The numbers can be moved up and down to further individualize the design.

* Animations can be disabled.

* Leading zeroes can be hidden.

* Hourly vibration can be enabled.

Shoutout to Christian Reinbacher who made a watchface based on the same design in parallel. We both liked the design so much that we decided to publish both versions.

Please remember to give the Watchface a "heart" if you like it. Thanks!

latest_release.release_notes:
slight animation improvements
no vibration during quiet time

data.title: Cut/up

data.author: bitrocklabs.com
data.description:
. Simple . Uncluttered . Tidy .

A clean watchface with a scrolling one-hour graph of your heartrate.

The bar graph depicts the last 60 records from your per-minute heartrate data. So if the watch has no data for that minute - in sleep mode, powered off, etc - then you will see an empty column.
data.title: Tidy HR Hourly Graph

data.description: A straightforward activity oriented watchface. It shows the actual activity value in the upper LCD circle. The percentage of your personal daily goal is shown by the longer dial in the lower circle (turning clockwise). Battery charge is displayed with the shorter dial in the lower circle (turning counterclockwise while discharging). Seconds can be enabled by configuration as well as different color styles.

data.description:
Every pilgrim's journey comes to an end...
------------------------------------------- 
Based on the hit watchface by Jon Tilton, Scott Pilgrim, SCOTT PILGRIM! Colour brings everyone's favorite black and white watchface to the Pebble Time in full HD colour surround sound support.

SCOTT PILGRIM! Colour does what most watchfaces do but is more... Scotty:

-Know what time it is in 12 hour time and 24 hour time!
-Know the month and date!
-Understand your place in the universe!

Known Bugs: 
-None, but let me know if you see any!
-------------------------------------------
I don't own Scott Pilgrim or the image used in this watchface, that was done by Jon Tilton. Thanks for your support!

latest_release.release_notes: Updated icon, thanks and credit goes to /u/PotatoFi for his great work!

data.description:
Colorful (fully configurable color scheme) watchface with large weather display and a big batteryload indicator (to show off to fruitwatch users). On Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2 a heart rate display is provided.

BT status display with optional buzz on connection change. 

Shows seconds or date. 12/24 hour supported. 

Killroy watches you over the timeline peek. Battery friendly (even with seconds display on). 

Only $1.99 with a one day free trial.

changelog.release_notes: *Initial Release

data.description:
The Island Crab is back! This time he’s ready for 4.0 with fun features and powerful performance.

•	12 or 24-hour time based on Pebble settings
•	Day and Night Modes
•	Hourly weather updates from OpenWeather.org
o	Manually refresh the weather by navigating to another screen and back
•	The Bluetooth monitor will show “Disconnected” when the connection is lost.
•	The island is a battery meter! It will sink as your battery gets low. If you see your crab in the water, give it a charge to get your island back.
•	Settings page will allow you to change temperature, set manual location for weather, and day color mode. After you save, just navigate to another screen and back to see the change. 

One-Time cost of $0.99 + local taxes after 7 day trial. Your contribution will help fund my education (ʘ‿ʘ)
data.title: Island Crab 2

data.description:
Analog watchface inspired by chronographs. Daytone allows you to configure almost everything. Change the colors, show or hide circles. The limitation is your imagination.

This is a paid watchface, only $0.99 USD + local taxes. It has 24 hours trail. Payment handled through KiezelPay.
www.kzl.io/daytone

Features:

- Quick View compatible

- Left infocircle tells the day of the week, and the battery.

- Right infocircle tells the month and the number of steps as a goal.

- Bottom infocircle tells the secods, day of the month and the current temperature.

- Options for enable or disable all or one infocircle, enable or disable health, battery, seconds.

- Change the watchface colors.

- If the watch hands are over the infocircles, shake to rise them, and be able to tell the date, or day or month. Wait 4 seconds or shake again to dismiss.

latest_release.release_notes: Added option for save battery life when showing seconds.

data.title: DayTone

data.description:
CoroWatch 2 (Prime)
Watchface khusus wong jowo wae,,
Bedo bek CoroWatch sing pertama, versi iki lueh apik tur soyo edan, nek versi iki samean iso delok jam jowo, tanggal, dino, cuaca lan liane

Krono tulisan jowo iku dowo lan ra aturan dadi iki ora selengkap tulisane, kudu enek sing disingkat lan diwei tanda "h", tanda "h" berarti puluhan, misale 23, 21, 30, 31, 40, 41 paham ra? conto

1 = siji
11 = suwelas
2 = loro
20 = loroh
21 - loroh siji

nyapo kok gak di gawe likuran? yen tak gawe likuran dadine, misale luweh ko 20 ditambahi "kur" mburine

< 20 = kur
1: seli (kur) // sip
2: roli (kur) // sip
3: teluli (kur) // sip
4: patli (kur) // sip
5: slawe (kur) // ajur
25 kudune kan selawe tok? asline di filter iso ae sih, dadi yen menit = 25 ra atik kur cuman masalahe iki mrembet nang kakean huruf, yo lek sik kur an, lek wes telungpuluh papat kangelan, dadi yen due ide tulung anuen yo. haha
Manut aku ae wes, timbang soyo edan, dadi ngene

Contone:

1:00 = siji noll
1:11 = siji swelas
1:12 = siji rolas
1:18 = siji wholu las..
9:02 = songo loro
9:20 = songo loroh
9:21 = songo loroh siji
9:04 = songo papat
2:40 = loro papath
3:03 = telu telu
3:30 = telu teluh
2:50 = loro seket
2:51 = loro seket siji

ongko puluhan koyok 20, 30, 40 ditandai karo huruf "h" nek mburine abjad
dadi lek tulisan "songo sijih" iki duduk jam songo luweh siji, tapi jam songo luweh sepuluh, ugo kata loro, telu, papat dadi loroh, teluh, papath sing enek "h" ne nek mburine berarti enek tambahan "0"

wes lek enek wektu tak jelasne neh, sing penting gaween sik ae, masalah jelasne mengko lek saham dewe samean 😂
data.title: CoroWatch 2

data.description:
go4hearts is a simple watchface which shows you your daily step count, date and time. 

In addition you get one heart (Zelda Style) for each 1000 steps in the left upper corner. (max. 20 hearths) For each new heart your Pebble will vibrate.

Watch out for easter eggs during the holiday!

********************************

go4hearts ist ein einfaches Watchface an dem ihr eure täglichen Schritte, das Datum und die Zeit ablesen könnt. 

Zusätzlich erscheint, pro 1000 Schritte, ein Herz (Zelda Stil) in der linken oberen Ecke. (max. 20 Herzen) Für jedes neue Herz vibriert die Pebble.

Inklusive Easter Eggs an Feiertagen!

data.author: Roger Leblanc

changelog.release_notes: Added Dark Sky to list of weather services in configuration page. (Thanks to Omi for bug report)

Added Signal Messenger support.
Added debug logging for phone battery.
- Fixed a crash that probably affect no one
- Fixed a bug that would return weather temperature in Kelvin instead of Celsius/Fahrenheit for OpenWeatherMap

- Added option to disable animations
- Added option to disable vibration on bluetooth disconnection
- Phone percentage is now saved on exit and reloaded on startup to avoid showing '0%' on startup

Thanks to Omi for suggestions

- Now respect Quiet Time (doesn't vibrate)
- Small code refactoring

- Added new option in configuration page to change notification text color. This will also color icons, which takes more battery. Leave to black to save battery. 

- Removed irrelevant city error message.

- GPS will now be used if you don't enter a city in watchface configuration page
- Fixed a memory issue that would make icons disappear after a certain amount of time
- N2W is now open source : https://github.com/RodgerLeblanc/N2W

(Thanks to IDLE0095 for bug report and suggestions)
Added new options for battery level in configuration page
Added Google Allo and Dashboard for Pebble support.
Added new option in configuration page for battery level : Do not show
Fixed Google Drive icon
Added support for multiple running apps and stock Music app
Added SZ.de and DB Navigator support
Added Sony Ericsson SMS, Threema, Le Monde and EuroSport support
- Fixed a layout hug for Pebble Time Round

- Fixed certain text not being centered correctly
- Code improvement

- Following multiple comments, battery level is now back on one line. You can choose between three different styles in configuration page.
- Added Google Drive and Google Inbox support.
- Code optimization

- Added support for Pebble Time 2
- Added option in configuration page for showing battery levels as icons (Thanks to Oskar for suggestion)

- Bigger font for battery percentage, also needed to change battery percentage placement on rectangular screen to allow bigger font. (Thanks to Omi for suggestion)
- Weather is now cached and reused for 30 minutes. (Thanks to Omi for suggestion)
- New weather provider selection in configuration page : Yahoo or OpenWeatherMap. Choose the one you prefer, Yahoo is default. (Thanks to Kristofer for suggestion)

data.description:
Get your notification icons on your Pebble and stop glancing at your phone every 2 minutes to see if you have unread notifications.

Supports all major social apps and many popular apps. Must be used with the connected Android app Notif2Watch.

Main features:
- Displays Android battery
- Displays Pebble battery
- Battery level shown as text,  icon or circle
- Weather (Yahoo or OpenWeatherMap)
- Vibrate on new notification
- Color configuration

Supports all Pebble : Pebble Classic, Pebble Steel, Pebble Time, Pebble Time Steel, Pebble Time Round, Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2.

data.description:
Do you feel stressed when looking at your watch? 

Time Span is a watchface that allows for a quick glance of your day with a single hour hand on a 12-hour scale. The hour radial fills as the hours and minutes pass by providing a more relaxed view of time.

This watch is perfect for day offs and casual timekeeping scenarios.

The design is heavily inspired by Botta Design's NOVA watch.

Extras
- Night & Day - two themes for both Night and Day. Night begins at 6 PM and ends at 5 AM.
- Vibrate upon disconnection
- Date display

Time in screenshots:
1) 23:00 (Night)
2) 11:00 (Day)
data.title: Time Span

• Ring: An option to have the watch battery level showing. Displayed in colours; Cyan, Orange, then Red.

data.author: ttmm
data.description:
This is a paid watchface. $0.99 + local taxes. You have 24h trial. Payment is handled through KiezelPay www.kzl.io/9ttmm 

9TTMM - minutes innovation. Minutes are divided in six groups of nine dots. Each dot represents a single minute. Every ten minutes the group transforms itself into one square. After thirty minutes a long rectangle appears. 

Temperature, date, time and battery. Weather using Pebble Master Key. BT disconnect alert and status. Color presets and color customization. Sunset mode. If you bought ALL TTMM with KiezelPay - 9TTMM you will get for free.

TTMM collection won Silver and Gold A Design Award in Interface and Interaction Design Category. Design: Albert Salamon. Programming: Gregoire Sage. Copyrights © Albert Salamon 2016

data.author: David Watson

changelog.release_notes: Allows you to set step goals in increments of 200 rather than 500
The only changes are allowing a minimum step goal of 2000 steps instead of 5000 and a minimum lower step goal of 500 instead of 1000

This release is all internal workings.  Squashed a bug when communication with the iOS app.  This version also dealocates memory used for weather if you are not using that component.  So sad to see what happened to Pebble being partially purchased, I can't find anything else quite like it out there that is waterproof, always on and viewable in sunlight, and programmable.

A small fix for users with less than a week worth of health data (new watch, just repaired, just reset, new phone, etc), which is required to display the yellow tick and the goal.  If there is no daily step goal data on the watch, it will instead use the user's step goal setting.  If the step average data is unavailable, it will divide the current daily step goal (or user pref if that is not available) based on the current hour.  If it is before 7am the goal is set to 100, if it is 10pm or later the average steps will equal the daily step goal, if between those times the average step goal will be the daily step goal divided by the current time.

So after some fustration on for everyone, I stopped using the pebble's app_timer function and wrote my own.  This prevents me from sleeping as deeply, but performs reliably which is more important.  The options to disable these functions now also work and I changed the idle timeout to 45 minutes

For whatever reason the 30 minute idle timer is not working correctly when the update first installs on your watch, if you relaunch the watchface it works fine. I checked and the variable is defined correctly, it simply isn't running correctly. I changed the way I am defining the variable in this version slightly hoping it will fix the issue

Sleep has been improved to display 8888 as the time when sleeping to be clearer that the display is intentionally not updating. Sleep is also now interrupt based so it takes less battery to check and sleeps deeper. Also added an option to disable sleep. Replaced the confusing manual sleep with IDLE, which is very similar to sleep except that it detects lack of movement for 30 minutes and goes to idle. Shake your wrist to wake up your watch or use the options in the pebble app to disable.  Enjoy
Small tweak to add a red circle color if you more than double your daily average steps/daily step goal.

Saves 1k in resources by eliminating some floating point code, changed the battery icon to be larger and fixed an order of operations error when calculating the width of the power remaining (undererepresenting the remaining power)

Added 3 weather providers for current weather data, you can specify if the circle fills according to you daily average or you daily step goal, the watchface can now sleep to save battery, you can also change the text color.
Sliders for step goals to reduce errors in user inputs
Basic functionality and configurable user defined goals

data.description:
All: Idle and Sleep are fixed and obey the settings as I replaced the builtin app_timer functionality.  

This watchface is a reconstruction of the Strider watchface with some additional custom features.  I would love to have some help or your suggestions...shoot me an email from the support link.  

-Set an mid day step goal as well as a day step goal, after you attain either of these goals your watch will buzz in a unique pattern and display which goal you met (top right of the screenshot).  The watchface will also buzz when you attain your average step goal for this day of the week over the last 4 weeks...ie the average daily steps of the last 4 Saturdays

-The watch can sleep with you and display "Watch is sleeping" with the time "..." and stop refreshing time/weather to save power .  Flick your wrist to wake the watch early, or you can disable this in the settings.

-The watch will go idle while you chill on the couch.  If it sees no significant movement for 45 minutes it will do the same thing as sleeping, flick your wrist to wake it up or just start walking.  Disable is available in options.

-The watchface is weather enabled and refreshes every 30 minutes.  Current weather data is available from Wunderground, Forcast.io, and OpenWeatherMap and you will need to sign up at https://www.wunderground.com/weather/api/d/docs, https://developer.forecast.io/, or http://openweathermap.org/appid to obtain a free API key.

latest_release.release_notes: Allows you to set step goals in increments of 200 rather than 500

data.description:
Show your support for the Cubs with this Wrigley Field-inspired watchface. An attempt was made to faithfully reproduce all aspects of our favorite scoreboard clock. Shake the watch or twist your wrist to display the current date and day of the week for 5 seconds (and a warning if Bluetooth is disconnected).

If you also own an original Pebble, Pebble 2, or Time Round, this watchface is available in versions specific to your platform.

Comments, feedback, bug reports, and feature suggestions are welcome! The code behind this watchface will be open-source and is currently freely available on request. Please e-mail me for any of these reasons.

data.description:
Clean watchface with on top a bar chart representing activity (steps). The bar chart represents the past 2 hours and is updated every minute. 

12/24 hour support (double digit), languages English, Dutch, French, Spanish, German and Italian. 

Colors for every element are configurable. European and American date presentation. BT warning buzz (can be switched off) with color change of minute display. Configurable battery level warning.

Under the graph the minimum and maximum calculated value is shown. Each bar represents 12 minutes. 

Below the time and date a summary is shown. It shows the active time from start of day and the walked steps since start of day.

The price is just $1,99 and there is a free trial for 24 hours.

This watchface will also run on Pebble 2/Pebble Time 2 and features a heartrate monitor in the bar chart.

data.description:
This watchface is to express weather information (including hourly data of cloud rate, precipiation, temperature and AQI) as funny figure, showing as a picture of a city.

Right now it is only support the weather resource in China。


这是一个将天气预报资料图象化的表盘。

V2.1可自制封面图传入(输入superyeh:/demo x.png可获取预存于云端的图档(x:0~9)。

V2.0支持城市剪影自制，安卓配套程式下载：
V1.2完整版，可存取删多档：
http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=889309507&uk=3422589443

采用了每小时预测共48小时(2天)资料。预测的资料图象化后，随着时间由右向左移动，到达现在所处的时间(以太阳或月亮的位置表示)。
时间可参考下方的时间格线，每格是两小时。

画面主题是城市的剪影(所在省份省会)。
主题画面上方有一横条细线，代表上次更新到现在的时间，参考时间格线，每格2小时。
现在时间代表的太阳或月亮会随着时间而上升与下沉。
天空随着一天的6个时段而变化颜色(每小时渐变)。
天空上端是云层厚度，云层越厚就遮蔽了天空与太阳、月亮。
云层下表现的是雨量，雨量越大，雨就会下到地面来。
城市下方的雾霾则象征了空气污染AQI的程度。AQI值越大，空污越严重，雾霾就越弥漫覆盖整个城市。

设定页可选择以GPS或地图点选来设定城市。
画面右上角增加GPS显示：
无图形表示地图点选；
实心图标表示使用GPS且定位成功；
空心图标表示使用GPS但定位失败(但使用上次定位成功的位置)。

V1.3以后
可以配套程式同步(目前仅)安卓手机系统日程，可以显示一个最近未到期日程，及最多2个已到期日程。以小飞机方式呈现出其时间点，并于到点时振动及标题提示。
(若新安装未进行日程同步，则系统内定一个装饰性小飞机，同步后即消除。)

配套安卓APP: WW_widget
V 1.4 :
http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=1789677664&uk=3422589443

(安装后请将小部件安装于桌面，必要时请重启手机，将自动同步最近日程，或按部件上时钟手动同步。)

这个表盘所想呈现的不是对气象资料精准数据的了解，而是以简单化、图象化、连续化，全观化、趣味化的方式来接受气象资料，并做为您短期(24小时)内日程的参考。

程式已设定：
震动提醒：整点、断线。
无扰时段：06-22时。
气象更新：每小时整点或按右键离开后按左键返回。更新会有天气提示。
data.title: Weather City

data.author: Turner Yey

changelog.release_notes: Fixed hourly vibration bug

data.description:
Wear a health monitor, not a smart watch.

Does your job subsidize the purchase of a health monitor but not a smart watch? No problem. Use this as your watch face and fool your boss into thinking it's only a health monitor.

From top to bottom is calories (per 1000), active time (in hours), steps (per 1000) and distance walked (per 1000).

In settings you can change:

- Display no leading zero for the hour.
- Turn off bluetooth disconnect vibration.
- Hourly vibrate with configurable time range.
- Raise arm gesture to turn on backlight.
- For Pebble 2 watches with built in heart rate monitor, you can replace the active seconds with your heart rate.
data.title: Instruments

data.author: Potassium Frog Ltd
data.description:
Slightly Magic, a ZX Spectrum game, was voted of the Top 100 Games of all time by readers of Your Sinclair magazine. This is the official Slightly Magic watch face, featuring the original ZX Spectrum graphics. Slightly waves his wand every minute, and displays the time and date.

Slightly Magic is now on Steam, remastered and reprogrammed by Colin Jones, the game's creator. This Pebble watch face was programmed by Dewi Gwyn Jones, Colin's son to celebrate 25 years of Slightly Magic!
data.title: Slightly Magic - Official 25th Anniversary Edition

data.author: Brian Haase

changelog.release_notes: - Fixed some of the caching issues causing stale/stuck display rails.
Version 1.7 now has support for Pebble Time Round.
- Fixed an issue where a failed request could cause a complete stall.
- Fixed the missing Weather API key missing message when weather is disabled.
- Minor bugfixes

- Version indicator at top of Configuration page.
- Fixed a persistent display glitch.

- Removed 45 minute interval option, it does not get handled correctly.
- Interval lookup was failing on the hour.

- Display data is now persisted between instances, to create a smoother user experience.
- Pebblekit will now only send 'changes'. If you don't change the payload, no data will be transmitted during the update. This should help save battery life.
- Dynamic tick handler. As long as you do not use blink, we will only wake the watch on the minute to update/redraw. Blinking will wake it every second.
- New Charging indicator state for the vertical power bar. Turns cyan if charging or plugged in.
- Polling Interval configuration. You can adjust how frequently the watch requests new data.
- Low power indicator no longer blinks red/white, it displays in red.

Added an option to enable a left-side bluetooth indicator.
- Bar will be blue when connected.
- Bar is black when disconnected.
Added an option to enable a right-side battery bar.
- Bar drains from top to bottom. 
- Green from 41%-100
- Orange above 21%-40%
- Blinks white/red at or under 20%
- Recommend disabling the rail override if your using the additional indicators.

Bugfix Release - Version 0.3
* Fixed Fahrenheit toggle in settings.
* Added UI feedback for bad credentials.
* Added UI feedback for when we are unable to locate Memory.pebble through the API.
* Reset to default values, to prevent lingering progress bars when moving back to a solid bar.
Alpha Test Release

data.description:
WARNING - This Watchface is designed specifically for use with Screeps.com, an online programming MMORTS. If you do not have a game account, this watchface is not for you.

You MUST read the documentation at the Github site to properly utilize this with your Screeps account.

Provides a crisp, clean time/date/weather display, as well as up to 4 information rails of information sourced directly from the memory of your running Screeps script. Information is collected from game memory through the official API.

Full source code and full documentation can be found here:
https://github.com/bthaase/ScreepsTime

latest_release.release_notes: - Fixed some of the caching issues causing stale/stuck display rails.

data.title: ScreepsTime

data.description:
Simple watchface designed to show the things i wanted :) options to change the background colour and text colour of the bottom panels but white is probably best for the text as it matches the icons!

Add your openweathermap api key in the options to get the weather working.

Panel behind the date changes to red and watch vibrates when bluetooth is disconnected.

Release 1.1: Added options to choose temperature unit, time background and text colours, date background and text colours and font size of data labels.

Known issues: Occasionally weather doesn't load [currently investigating]
Possibly need more weather icons for night time [todo]

Seems pretty stable but use at your own risk :)

Any issues, just let me know!

data.description:
Free

==Overview==
Are you active, energetic, or always on the go? Someone like you needs a watchface that can handle the way you live. Look no further; Vitality is the answer you've been looking for. Take a glance at every health option you need to keep yourself on track throughout the day. Enhance your lifestyle with Vitality!

==Features==
-Simple & clean design
-12 / 24 hour time
-US / EU date format
-BT Disconnect Vibration & BT Icon
-Battery level
-3 changeable text lines to suit your priorities
-6 health information options: Steps, Distance, Calories, Sleep, Deep Sleep, Active Time
-Progress bar with an option to choose a fixed step goal or typical steps.
-Beat your typical steps by comparing your progress to the marker.
-Quick View support

-Languages: English, Español, Deutsch, Nederlands, Français, Italiano

Remember to leave a ❤ if you enjoy using Vitality!
data.title: Vitality

data.description:
Active is designed to give you a sporty look to your new Pebble 2. See the current time, heart rate, date, and step progress or battery status. You can customize what your daily step goal should be or set it to your average. You will also see an indicator on the progress bar, this shows what you typically walk in that given time of day.

Features:
-Toggle on/off the heart rate
-Toggle on/off the date
-Customize if the hour/minutes should have a fill or outline
-Set custom step goal or show battery status

& more coming soon!

Thanks and enjoy!

Team Kiezel-
data.title: Active

data.description:
Stripemalism - Stripes & minimalism

(Time, Weather, Health)

+ TIME
+ ALTERNATIVE STYLE WITH DATE

+ BATTERY CHARGE (column 1) (each stripe +10%)
+ STEP GOAL PROGRESS (column 2) (each stripe +10%)
+ WEATHER TEMPERATURE (column 3) (each stripe +4C (0..40) / +7F (32..104)). Highest stripe indicates whether temp is below 0C, and then each stripe -4C (0..-36) / (32..-33F).

+ THEME: 14 themes, Random all/selected, Weather (theme depends on the weather condition)
+ USER COLORS theme: full custom!
+ STEPS GOAL: 5000, 10000, 15000, ...
+ NIGHT THEME: choose a theme to be used at night
+ TIME FORMAT (12h/24h, detected from Pebble settings)
+ Vibration ON DISCONNECT/RECONNECT (Yes, No). Disconnected indicator.
+ Hourly vibration.
+ WEATHER LOCATION (Blank for auto detection, ZipCode,CountryCode for manual location)

Designed and developed by dPunisher.
Check out dp-watchfaces.com

data.description:
Watchface inspired by Vario Nato Sky Pyramids watchstrap.

Time and date shown on the sides of pyramids.

The lines change color to record the passing of time. 

Time:
Top pyramid shows the hour with 5 lines either side changing to dark blue from bottom up.  
At the peak of the hour is an AM/PM indicator (dark blue for PM).
10-minutes show in the same way on the left hand pyramid below this. The lines from the 2 side join to form 5 markers.
Single minutes are shown on the right hand pyramid with 9 lines changing.

Date:
If selected, this is shown below the time in the same way.
Months at top.
10-days below on left and single days on right.

The are 4 display options:
1. Time and date (default)
2. Time and date, but with surrounding pyramids (harder to read)
3. Time and date, with surrounding pyramids faded (easier than 2)
4. Just time

The animation cycles through these (and Quick Views) for 5:45PM, September 22


Watchface Design & Programming Copyright © 2016 Nev Rawlins
data.title: Pyramids
